memorial.translation[0].definitions[0].d: something, especially a stone with writing on it, that reminds people of someone who has died
memorial.translation[0].definitions[0].e: An appeal has been launched to build a lasting memorial to the composer.
The hospital was built as a memorial to King Edward VII.
memorial.translation[0].definitions[1].d: an achievement that reminds people of someone who has died
memorial.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The garden is a memorial to one of the finest Victorian gardeners.
memorial.translation[1].definitions[0].d: done or made in order to remind people of someone who has died
memorial.translation[1].definitions[0].e: A memorial service will be held at 7 pm on Saturday.
